goal.core.agent

Class DefaultMessagingCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.agent.DefaultMessagingCapabilities
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingCapabilities

    public class DefaultMessagingCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessagingCapabilities
    Provides the agents MessagingCapabilities by using a MessageBox. The complexity of using the message box is hidden from the agent.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje
